Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 35th/Paulina
ShortDescription: Eastbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via Orange Line, Archer, Ashland and 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via Orange Line, Archer, Ashland and 35th, due to street blockage near 35th/Paulina.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
